and username LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%')

select '组管理' AS username,hostname,port,'root' AS server_username, (case status when 0 then rootPassword when 1 then sqlkey else filekey end) as loginKey, group_name,group_status, CAST(status AS char) AS status FROM groupserver WHERE gid = #{groupId}

SELECT DISTINCT A.*, (CASE WHEN B.groupID is not NULL then TRUE ELSE FALSE END ) AS apply_status FROM sys_group A LEFT JOIN(SELECT groupID FROM apply_group WHERE username=#{username} AND status =3)B ON B.groupID = A.id WHERE `status`=3 AND id!=#{groupId}
SELECT count(1) FROM apply_group WHERE username=#{username} AND groupID=#{groupId}
mapper.delete: delete from apply_group where FIND_IN_SET(username,#{username})!=0 AND groupID=#{groupId} AND status=3;
